channel.title: We come to mopar for help
channel.description:
I represent zamorak.org, a very small but semi-popular cheating community. As you probably don't know, we are under an unprovoked attack by sythe.org. I would appreciate it if you guys could make threads protesting the unprovoked attackes there, and post the following. Hopefully there is still a sensible cheating community besides Sythe. I don't believe in cyberwars, and hopefully you guys don't either. When I tried to make a thread to show the truth to sythe members, I was perm banned with no reason given. Please help.
http://www.zamorak.org/showthread.php?p=6857
[i] A good admin can make a good forum But overpowered mods can destroy that [/i] -93dcthugs93

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

Just to clarify, he asked for sthe not sythe

Anyway, I agree with Mr. Chris.

The community seems full of pricks, and scammers.

Read full topic
item.source: We come to mopar for help

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:12, topic:102694”][quote author=Ultimacool link=topic=147120.msg1399742#msg1399742 date=1180543071]
can i ask what sthe.org is?
[/quote]

Looks like one of the online business info search sites.[/quote]

Lol…

Sythe is the worst cheating community. Scams, rips, steals and claims he did it all himself. Not to mention the forum members. They are nearly as bad as this place…Well, the Moparscape side of it.

Read full topic

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

Repentless:

Annex himself said that Sythe had allowed it. Bull.

It doesn’t look like he is doing much to stop it either, does it?

About threatening with milw0rm… That’s just lame. Milw0rm is a community full of idiots and only a very small minority of the people there actually know something, and those who know are smart enough to stay away from these “cyber wars” that have nothing to do with them. Of course, some blackhats might do something, but only if you offer them something in exchange.

Read full topic
item.source: We come to mopar for help

item.description:

Annex himself said that Sythe had allowed it. Bull.

Read full topic
item.source: We come to mopar for help

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[QUOTE=Sythe]You are being completely childish. I am not the appointed administrative contact for this website, as is made perfectly clear in my whois information. You have appointed yourself as administrative contact for your dirtbag site, and as such, your name and address, and phone number, are on public record.

I do not need to explain the actions of Annex. He is not acting under my authority or as a representative of sythe.org, but of his own free will. I do not need to explain anything to any of you. But in the interest of stalling any further hostilities I felt it was my duty to educate you on the basics of copyright law and why the world doesn’t conform to your childish whims.

Hopefully this has addressed all your questions. This discussion is now closed, and as promised earlier all zamarock representatives will be banished from this website permanently for wasting our time.

Good day.[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
item.source: We come to mopar for help

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @Repentless Repentless
item.description:
@Repentless wrote:

I can’t use any legal options, the person who attacked us uses Tor.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 04:44:46 AM[/size][hr]And that’s the reason I’m asking you guys to post that on Sythe, I want to talk to them, but a corrupt admin perm’d me so nobody would find out.

Read full topic
item.source: We come to mopar for help

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:5, topic:102694”]I hate to say it, but it’s probably a pointless thing to try. Most of the people in the cheating communities are dick heads - that’s blunt but true. There’s little, if any, hope in sitting down and having a somewhat mature conversation that you could expect to lead to improving the situation.

If it’s a DOS attack, then you’d be best off looking into legal options rather then continuing a silly fight.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: We come to mopar for help

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I hate to say it, but it’s probably a pointless thing to try. Most of the people in the cheating communities are dick heads - that’s blunt but true. There’s little, if any, hope in sitting down and having a somewhat mature conversation that you could expect to lead to improving the situation.

If it’s a DOS attack, then you’d be best off looking into legal options rather then continuing a silly fight.

Read full topic

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

yes, but the roots of this still lies with that “VU System”. Annex threatened with milw0rm which is pretty lame (cowardly if you ask me).

Read full topic
item.source: We come to mopar for help

item.title: We come to mopar for help
item.dc:creator: @Repentless Repentless
item.description:
@Repentless wrote:

Speljohan:

yes, i know how it is Repentless I just want to say, i’m neutral in this question on Sythe.org, but i still support you and i am pretty sure you were the first with this system. Keep fighting for your cause!

It’s not even about the VU system anymore, even though they ripped that. They’ve just started waging cyber war on us unprovoked, and they perm banned me for no reason.

EDIT: Add gumball7777@hotmail.com on msn, they froze my other one.

Read full topic
